class.name: ResourceFormatSaverLuauScript
class.brief_description: Saves [LuauScript] resources to Luau script files ([code].lua[/code] and [code].luau[/code]).
class.description: [ResourceFormatSaverLuauScript] is a specialized [ResourceFormatSaver] that integrates Luau scripts into Godot's resource saving system. It automatically handles saving [LuauScript] resources to [code].lua[/code] and [code].luau[/code] files when they are saved through Godot's resource management system.
